  • View page source

rnalysis.enrichment.RankedSet.plot_enrichment_resultsÂ¶

static RankedSet.plot_enrichment_results(results_df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, fdr=0.05, en_score_col: str = 'log2_fold_enrichment', name_col: Optional[str] = None, title: str = '', center_bars: bool = True, plot_horizontal: bool = True, ylabel: str = '$\\log_2$(Fold Enrichment)') → matplotlib.figure.FigureÂ¶

Receives a DataFrame output from an enrichment function and plots it in a bar plot. For the clarity of display, complete depletion (linear enrichment = 0) appears with the smallest value in the scale.

Parameters

  • fdr â

  • name_col â

  • results_df (pd.DataFrame) â a pandas DataFrame created by FeatureSet.enrich_randomization.

  • en_score_col (str (default 'log2_fold_enrichment')) â name of the DataFrame column that contains the enrichment scores.

  • title (str) â plot title.

  • ylabel (str) â plot ylabel.

  • plot_horizontal (bool (default True)) â

  • center_bars (bool (default True)) â if True, centers the bars around Y=0. Otherwise, ylim is determined by min/max values.

Returns

Figure object containing the bar plot

Return type

matplotlib.figure.Figure instance
